storyInfo: The Infected knights are preparing to once again trigger a Great Separation, and Rhodes Island continues to jostle with the General Chamber. Under this climate, Margaret welcomes her showdown with the Candle Knight.

attributes.content: Her very first time entering a knight competition, Viviana Droste earned a title; 'Glimmer' Viviana. Three years later, with her Major debut, she became one of the Grands, taking on the honorific title 'The Candle Knight.'
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: In terms of talent, she's the youngest any of the ten Grand Knights have ever been. In terms of strength, hers is still growing to this day. She can't be taken lightly.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Margaret, are you listening?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Yes. I'm just reminiscing some.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Auntie, is this like how you and Margaret... used to take on the Major?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Well, if you want to talk then... heheh.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: A certain someone always vanished after a match ended, either holing up in her room studying deep into her next opponent's traits, or secretly running off to train her swordhand with Młynar...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I still remember us all agreeing to celebrate with a feast the first time Margaret won, and in the end she let it completely slip her mind.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: When we found her, she was dragging her battered body, attempting her own Arts in the garden.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I did want to ask right then, aren't you freezing?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It was because my Arts can alleviate pain, too, so...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: So ultimately it's not proper treatment, or else what value would modern medicine even have?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Heheh... I won't argue with that.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I know many a doctor that would astonish you. It's thanks to their invaluable techniques that rescuing others is no longer a far-fetched notion.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals? Or was it those two Sarkaz women?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Both. They're all in the fight against suffering.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Come to mention it, Miss Shining and Miss Nightingale went to link up with friends from Rhodes Island, didn't they?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I'm not sure how they're doing right now.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: No matter if they're in the Grand Knight Territory, they're still giving all they have to assist the Infected. I believe in them.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But what I myself must do is unrelated to Rhodes Island's will. I can't force this responsibility upon them.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hence why I separated from Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret... take a little care of yourself too, when you can.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: There's something fine for you to say. If you want to talk mess, Maria, you've been SO much worse.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Haha...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Alright—anyhow.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What's the plan of action now? I don't think training would have much meaning to you now, personally speaking.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But this is your first time in years facing a Grand Knight. Should we have a little exercise, get back to peak condition?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If you would, Zofia.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Brilliant.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria, you're up.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Er, um? I thought I was fine to just sit and watch?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Sit and watch? I didn't ask you to bring your equipment for no reason, did I? Didn't you see what happened last time? Do you want me taking the Radiant Knight alone again?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ungh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Zofia, if she isn't willing...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: And don't you coddle her!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A—Am I sparring with Margaret? I've never...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: When Margaret was competing, you were just a little girl. Though you still are now.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Yes, yes!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Let's give our Radiant Knight a little taste of how independent knight, Maria Nearl, toppled Left-hand Knight.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Alright, Margaret... let's go!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Meeting Maria's gaze, the words of a certain someone suddenly pop into the Radiant Knight's mind.

attributes.text: Has she renounced... the path of knighthood?
Was it I—who made her give it up?

attributes.content: I'm aware, I'm aware... the scheduling for next week's meeting is already in place. Yes. I will not be absent.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I assure you I'll see the work delegated to me through. Yes, I'm very sorry. No... it's nothing to do with the Radiant Knight. I remain an employee of the company. I'll accomplish whatever business is at hand.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: It has absolutely nothing to do with my status. Sir, please leave me out of this mockery. They're unrelated matters and nothing else...
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Thank you. Alright, I'll see you next week at the meeting.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Someone's a singleton, huh?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Is this what the Radiant Knight and her sister do too? Never come back home?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Toland. I've warned you, don't set foot on my carpet whenever you please.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: The Armorless Union's eye is firmly fixed upon you. Are you planning to drag me down alongside?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Now that's beyond my wildest dreams. Relax. As long as they don't fold their big slippery kill-men in, how are a bunch of armed lackeys ever gonna track me down?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I'm not winning in a fight, this city's their turf. But if they want to catch me, they'll have to show they want it.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Are you asking me to praise your audacity?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Now that'd be something else. A high knight praising me, some lowlife? I wouldn't carry that weight, would I?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I am no longer a knight.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Not even today, with the Radiant Knight getting her title back?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Shamelessness.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Why are you here?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: C'mon, I didn't come to the Grand Knight Territory just for you, Mister Knightsir... but in seriousness, if I could talk you into lending a hand to us, that'd be a fine, fine thing.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I regretfully inform you, this matter is already settled.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Even though I've given a hundred percent to protecting your little Nearl nieces?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Even then.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Alright, fine.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Maybe you really have changed. Młynar. I'm just giving you a heads up...
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I passed by the border of Kawalerielki today. Those districts were originally a city of their own, right?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You still remember the sight we saw when we came back to the GKT together, back when we were young?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Miles of camps outside the city knocked together by the refugees and the poor, bonfires in the evening lighting up the faces of the homeless.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Infected, bandits, farmers, workers, even knight nobility thrown to the beasts. If tragedy was a melting pot, there it melted.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: The sobbing and the anger all mixing together. Even as people to the side are being robbed and killed, they just shuffle their bodies around and try to give themselves a better sleep.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Ha... I know you wouldn't forget. I know you... you've just been angry for too long, lost hope.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I won't need you to help me decide.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: The Armorless Union is cleaning out the Infected's haunt tonight. The coordinates are on this sheet.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: And what do the Infected knights... have to do with me?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Oh, Kazimierz is loaded with ways to treat the Infected. Even if they drive them to take each other's lives like gladiators, they still beat Ursus by a long shot.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: —But the workers infected in the building of the city, the farmers infected when they couldn't escape Catastrophe, and the survivors struggling so they can become knights?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: They'll die like wretches before your eyes. What the Infected will go through will directly impact how public opinion determines the Radiant Knight. And then, in the end, everything you love will be swept into the storm that follows.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You don't need to threaten me.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: What about you, then?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I'll help out a bit, 'as I feel it.' If it really comes down to it, I might risk my neck a little.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Pinus Sylvestris is an important potential partner of ours, and I want to pull them in with us. Ha, sure, they're Infected, but they're big fancy knights, just like you, aren't they?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: And that's about that... I'll give you a final touch of advice, Młynar.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: The big picture's coming together. Staying out of it won't get you anywhere, anymore.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: All present, then?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Since when did you have so many people?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: However many knights have been oppressed, are however many knights here.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Drop the idea that you're the only one who's suffered and wants to rebel, Szewczyk.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: 'Plastic' Szewczyk. I've got no prejudice against pets of the General Chamber like you, but I can't say how happy I am, still seeing some will to rebel in your eyes.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Everyone still has a trace of it. The unwillingness to drift with the tide.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Hah! Drifting with the tide's one thing, but this swell's gonna beat us dead clear as day in the darkest dump around! And that's sure as hell not their call to make!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The plan's very simple.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Three years ago, on the day before that Major, the moment the four cities were about to link up, the core city power plant got paralyzed by terrorists.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: In order to merge smoothly, each district already had its own engines shut off. When the core city's power dropped out of them in that state, every district was forced to switch over to their independent power systems, which included their cities' engines.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: At that point, in order to stop the districts colliding, the Grand Knight Territory was forced to completely scatter apart.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The Great Kawalerielki Separation.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But this time, while the Major's on, we're going to completely cut the lights in all the Grand Knight Territory's arenas.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I've heard it multiple times and it still sounds crazy. Can we really pull this off all on our own?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: If the Grand Knight Territory fell this easy, then Ursus would've razed Kazimierz to the ground ages ago.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Does this tie in with your... 'Sprawiedliwi friends?'
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Strange. The Adeptus allowing the Separation to rear its scandalous head again? What are they calculating?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Hah, what, the biggest scandal wasn't getting rode out by the business suits?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: What's the specific plan?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Tomorrow evening, Greynuty's taking a team to shock-attack the Grand Knight Territory power plant.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ordinarily, it's heavily guarded down there, but on this occasion, the Adeptus are gonna deliberately leave an opening... to give us 'something to exploit.'
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: If the Adeptus are willing to help us so much, why don't they just do this themselves?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Haha, they don't exactly speak in unity. Not just the Adeptus, the law-and-order National Council, the Knights Association, even the General Chamber of Commerce...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We've seen our fair shares of the volatile human condition. Since when would they ever be so simple?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Justyna, you go with Ashley.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: After you complete your mission, cover them while they withdraw, then rush for the General Chamber building three kilometers out. Szewczyk'll be there to back you up at the designated spot.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: As for you, Iwona, you're gonna have to handle the Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Aha, just what I wanted to hear!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The Armorless are already watching this place, so we won't get to pull this off so smooth. You've gotta find some way to proactively get them into a fight, Iwona, draw their attention away.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Of course, if any 'elites' show up, you've gotta hit the brakes, turn tail, and scram.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The next time we hold a celebration dinner, I don't want your seat empty. I'll have no one to drink with, otherwise.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Relax. As long as you don't mess up and electrocute yourself, I'll keep with you to the bitter end.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Finally... with the help of a few conscientious reporters, we've found a passage to infiltrate the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The entrance to the Chamber building's freight elevator is underground. Usually it's only Messengers and porters that go through there—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: —Of course, even a freight elevator has its cameras. It won't be as easy as that.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But at the time of the last Great Kawalerielki Separation, with the power out, a Messenger trapped in the elevator escaped by himself, then got caught by a reporter for an interview—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: He got into the elevator well through the air vent, climbed up, all the way to the fourth floor meeting rooms.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Our objective's the penthouse computer room. Once we steal the data, I'll find a way to immediately upload it to your terminals, and all of you can get the material—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: —So that this'll work, even if you don't make it out?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You can't tell me anything of the sort, Sona. I'm disappointed in you. Even if it succeeds, this operation won't mean anything at all.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Not just you.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Assaulting the power facilities. Facing the Armorless Union. Not a single aspect of this is safe.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: You want 'safety' now? Hmph, if the Armorless really do send assassins for us, it'll be nothing but playing hunter.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: And moreover, we're certain to be the prey. Anyone who's not prepared for this, I suggest you back out right now. Don't drag us down when the time comes.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: We have no way out in the first place, Sir Knight.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: We were prepared for this long ago, because we never even needed to prepare.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: What we genuinely need amounts to two things.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The truth of Area 0—the cage for the Infected secretly built by the General Chamber—we need to let the whole world know about it.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: And the Armorless Union's 'roster.' To put it in perspective, even the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi doesn't know how many are on that list... In the worst-case scenario, it'll all have been a ruse set up by those spymasters in the first place.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Even so, as long as we succeed in handing these two things over to the Adeptus, we can get our legal papers back... and we won't ever be anyone else's playthings again.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: As long as we give the Adeptus a reasonable motive to investigate Area 0 and the Armorless Union, it'll be the best attack they could ever make on the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Win or lose, this is the moment.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Alright! I like those looks in your eyes!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Well then... anything weighing on you, Toland Cash?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You ought to show your face after eavesdropping for so long, right? Iwona's told us already. We won't pull anything on you.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: It's a bold plan. Infected and knightpeople, pleased to meet you.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: A bounty hunter? Flametail, you never mentioned an outsider like this taking part in the fight.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: You can't stand bounty hunters? Very sorry, but I've got my own share of hate for knights—
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: But I imagine the fancy knights know to take stock of a situation, especially ones like you, giving up your knighthood for your family. Factually admirable, I tell you.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: So what I think, is that maybe you might need a little help in other ways—no, that's fine if you don't trust me—for example, a blueprint of the K.G.C.C. Tower's internal structure.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Where did you get it?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: There's more ways than you know, Miss, but human connections work best.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: If you want to join in on us, fine. But. Hm, just as an interview, I want to hear your reasons.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Reasons?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Ahh... you can already see the K.G.C.C. building from this angle. It's one you can catch from any dim alley in the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I want to see it crumble. It's that simple.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Have you ever been to one of those villages hammered by taxation and Catastrophes?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I've been. I see them fight over things. I see them run fugitive. I see them pass on.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I've been to many a place.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: It sounds like you've got plentiful experience.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hah, don't look at me. I thought he was a decent sight from the beginning, right?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (A beeping noise)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: No objection.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: It's your call.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Alright, then. Welcome to the club, Mr. Toland.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: You're working hard.;(Nod in greeting) ......;Burning the midnight oil?

attributes.content: Ah... mm, I'm alright. All the Medic Operators have been hard at work too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Infected knights... I thought they were a special case in Kazimierz, but they number far more than I imagined.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They even have scarring from beast bites... it's precisely because of this that ordinary hospitals are so hesitant to accept wounded Infected for treatment.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: However...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No... I can't shake this feeling that something, somewhere isn't normal.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's nothing wrong with building an Infected treatment facility in an isolated district, but the people who've accepted treatment, they've all been 'knights'...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If it were just for handling Infected knights, they shouldn't have needed to go to so much trouble.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What I mean is... there might be quite a few Infected knights... but how many people—is this nomadic platform able to contain?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The other sections... the workers won't let us near them, but what are those areas—doing?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I'll ask Gravel if she knows anything.
You need to get some rest first.

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't push yourself too hard, Doctor. The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi's knights might be treating us politely thanks to our ties with Miss Nearl, but this is still Kazimierz's core in the end.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's right, where's Gravel? Wasn't she staying at your side?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I asked her for some company info from the K.G.C.C.
If I can, I want a meeting with the spokespeople and our partners.

attributes.content: Ah... but given you're the one requesting it...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, you have to be careful when you're dealing with those businesspeople.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've been hearing of all sorts of rumors from the knights these past few days...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, that's right, I heard about Nearl's performance! Quite a few of the Infected knights coming for treatment are fans of hers!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'd known 'The Radiant Knight' held weight in Kazimierz, but never imagined this scale.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I hear Nearl's sister's old enough to fight in the knight competitions, so actually she must be older than me, even... if we get the chance, I'd really like to meet her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya! You're here too, Doctor!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Ah, Hibiscus. Any news?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Well... it's a little hard for me to put... um.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The knights who came in today were talking about 'demonic treatment,' 'the shady doctor from Kazdel' and the like...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: We wouldn't... advertise like that, would we? To be honest, it should be 'the health administering maestro from Kazdel' anyway!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I—I'll consult Gravel and the spokesman. How did it end up like this?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh! But—getting a little famous isn't so bad, either. I've been here a while, and you do get to see the same faces from time to time.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: With such frequent injuries, it seems like competing as a knight isn't much of an easy job.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But—I did previously tend to an Infected who was seriously hurt, and I haven't seen him for the past few days. Who knows how his recovery's been going...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Do you mean Mr. Silverlamp Knight?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right-right-right, and after I finished basic treatment, he got hauled off by a Knights Association person... I don't know where he's gone.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Ah, I see someone waving at me! I need to head over right away! Amiya, don't forget to ask what's going on with that for me!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: These Infected knights look... permanently exhausted, going by their faces.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Some may have won matches, gotten considerable prize money, but still can't muster their spirits at all.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's not like I've never seen this look before. It's just like fighting to the death has filled their entire lives to the point they could burst, and they can't bear even the slightest hope or optimism.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Infected knight competitions... are simply treating the Infected as entertainment products.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm starting to understand a little, what Nearl is here for.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, come in.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Doctor, are you always so busy in here?)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, about that meeting you mentioned last time—I've gotten it all set up and ready.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh? Am I interrupting yours and Miss Amiya's conversation?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's perfectly fine, Mr. Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A few medical corporations collaborating with Rhodes Island are deeply interested in your firm's services and technology. Of course, even with a mind for simple friendship, they'd still love to have dinner with you.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: However... if you'd allow me to warn you. If Miss Amiya is to participate... she is ultimately Infected, and I worry you'll be treated in unneeded ways.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's alright, I'm already used to it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: My apologies.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: By the way, Dr. {@nickname}, here's the business magazine you mentioned before... I didn't expect you to take such an interest in Kazimierz's economic situation.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Do you plan to open a subsidiary in Kazimierz? I've heard your firm keeps a 'branch office' in our nation.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: (D—Doctor, our branch office shouldn't have been officially communicated to the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi yet, right? Did they already... investigate their way to it?)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Just wanted to get an idea of the Chamber.;I did want to get a look into Kazimierz's situation.;Do you regard Rhodes Island well?

attributes.content: You've made the right choice.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I myself only recently began to understand them, but if you truly want to figure out the 'General Chamber of Commerce,' you won't go wrong starting with the 'commerce' part.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Haha, if you do plan to start a business in the Grand Knight Territory someday, be sure to contact me. I'll find you the best team of lawyers for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: To tell the truth, Rhodes Island's technology and corporate culture... do deeply move me.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm not saying it out of politeness. I believe 90% of Kazimierz's citizens would agree the Infected form an issue, but the majority of the time, none of them want to solve it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Rather than avoiding the problem via violence, there's 'treatment.' Yes, Oripathy is just an illness in the end, isn't it?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: Something seems to be worrying you.;What's on your mind?

attributes.content: There was an accident in which an Infected passed away on the field, not long ago.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm not casting judgment on this incident itself. I'm saying the force of public opinion is greater than we can imagine.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm no professional at all, but I think of, and you understand better than me, an Infected dying from overcasting in the arena inviting uncontrollable danger, and how great that danger is—
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: —Despite it being, in my eyes, near-deliberate harassment, an unjust confrontation... the fact of the matter is, the barbs of the masses from far and wide are aimed at the Infected.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I worry whether it might affect our cooperation... my Rhodes Islander friends.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Mr. Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's not the first time the Infected have been through something like this, and it won't be the last.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In places beyond Kazimierz, what Infected go through far surpass what you've seen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A partner of mine, from before I was a spokesman, was once the Rose Paper Union's Executive Director of Publishing.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I quickly came to recognize 'the terror of gossip,' Miss Amiya, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Perhaps opinion as of late will impact your work. I'll do my best to placate the moods of the workers and those receiving treatment.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Thank you very much, Mr. Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's the least I can do.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It seems I still have a little time today... Dr. {@nickname}, did we have an appointment prior?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If you're free, do let me tour you around Kazimierz a bit.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: Can Amiya come with us?;I'm not the only one who admires Kazimierz's splendor.

attributes.content: Of course, so long as the formalities and credentials are in hand, an Infected such as Miss Amiya is free to act as she wishes.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I—I'll be fine, I still need to check in with all our Medic Operators to—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Appropriate rest is very important, Miss Amiya. Additionally, the patient who just arrived is the last for today.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Well, then, we'll meet downstairs in ten minutes.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Malkiewicz has gotten real close to Rhodes Island lately. Oof, that's not good.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The Board of Directors hasn't classified Rhodes Island as a target... which can only mean Darksteel has a different view of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The three of them have foresight a mile better than the average suits. How many years have they hung around in Kazimierz?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: What's the point? They're still just the pawns of the K.G.C.C.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Sometimes, foresight means 'forget beating the rules that don't benefit you, you've gotta learn to use them, join them.'
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Yeah, of course the young bunch and the 'ooh, look at me, look at my glory' knights aren't gonna approve of that argument, but it's everywhere, and if you want the truth of society, there it is.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: What makes your theory so different from all those corporate employees?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The difference is... we're strong enough.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Don't see the logic.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Haha, let's just get back to business. The Board's already made a decision vis-a-vis the Infected purge order.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: So soon?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I told the people upstairs about the Infected knights' plans to riot, after all.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Make them realize in advance. Let them be aware 'the Grand Knight Territory is about to face an Infected attack.'
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: That's the only way we'll get any space made to operate.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: So, then...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: We're still tidying a few Infected as appropriate.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Hmph, could've saved your breath from the start.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: We've gotta do what we've gotta do, and if we don't do it with enough smarts, we'll invite our own killers in.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: There sure aren't any heroes in Kazimierz. Look at the bustling street before us. Who'd waste the energy standing off with this city?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Kazimierz's champions—they still carry the people away in this day and age. *chuckle* Truly wondrous.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: You want to say... it's because I'm old, don't you?
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: I would never regard you in that matter.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Your Excellency, these documents are classified by the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi. Will handing them over to Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I haven't reached senility yet.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: That wasn't my meaning.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: ...Senomy.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I hear... you never actually offered your patriarch your true name.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: We simply 'have a hold on your name,' haven't yet earned your loyalty...
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Your Excellency, Grand Knight, I was sold as a slave into Kazimierz, no more.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I'm deeply honored I could receive the appreciation of the master of the house, but how can someone like me have anything to do with the act of offering a true name?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: You've been in contact with Rhodes Island for a time, now. How's it been?
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: I believe myself to have already earned a... portion of Rhodes Island's trust.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: That's not what I mind at all, Senomy. What I mind is, has Rhodes Island won your trust?
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Campaign knights are servicemen. You're abiding strictly to your duties, fighting bravely for Kazimierz.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: You're still so young. Why constrain your own mind?
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: All we can give the young is the kindling. It's up to you to light the fire.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: You don't like Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: No... it's just...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: If we suppose providing care to the Infected like that is 'justice,' then—what Kazimierz, the Adeptus have been doing for so long—how are we meant to we regard that?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Go and find out yourself. You've still got a long, long road ahead.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: The Armorless Union's begun to move. I assume, before the Major hits fever pitch, they want to eliminate the Infected threat.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: —Do they really plan to hold a massacre inside the city?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: They have cause to. The Infected are indeed planning an attack on the General Chamber's tower. That's not an easy thing to handle.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Margaret Nearl—she resembles her grandfather quite a bit.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: She's very unlikely to stay out of this.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: She's also an exceptional case. Whether the Infected, or the Armorless, they hide outside of the rules drawn up by themselves, and so, suffer the cruelest struggles.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight... has managed to pierce into this barrier. Pierce into the den of horror that calls itself the knight competitions.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: The Nearls wouldn't raise an uneducated knight. By all rights, she should know she's doing no better than bailing water with a glass.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: And so... the Adeptus decided to grant her one chance. One chance to humiliate the business suits, one chance to let the knights prove themselves.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: They are going to give every ounce to support the Radiant Knight's championship bid.
attributes.name: An Aged Knight

attributes.content: Welcome! Welcome, one and all! Welcome to the Kazimierz National Arena, and welcome to the site of the Major today!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I'm your old buddy Greatmouth Mob, honored to host this match you've all been waiting for!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ooh, I've never seen passion swell as high as this—I've gotta tell you all some juicy data. The match hasn't even started, and the number of people watching has already cemented itself as this Major's highest yet!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And at the same time! Over the match, we'll be drawing lots for ten lucky people here in the audience! These ten winners are going to get their hands on an assigned tie-in souvenir each!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: No time to waste, ready your greatest rounds of applause! Out of the legends of the ancient family comes history's youngest champion! Give a warm welcome—to—THE RADIANT KNIGHT! MAAAARGAREEEEEET NEAAAAAAARL!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight Margaret Nearl, returning to the field with a celestial beauty! In just a few short weeks, she's seized qualification to join in on the Major—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And it doesn't end there! Today will see this Major's first clash of Grand Knight on Grand Knight! With the honor of 'the T, the H and the E' on their titles, that's all you need to hear to know what these knights are about!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Margaret Nearl, Nearl the Radiant Knight! Today, she faces her opponent, the light of elegance from Leithanien!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: She's been nominated for Most Popular Knight over and over, eighteen individual honors to her name—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And if that wasn't enough, her first ever competition, she beat Frost Skull Knight to become the greatest of dark horses! She was runner-up in the last Major's duels! Not to mention her popularity, an utterly uncontested number two in the nation!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Dark horse? What's dark horse mean? Dark? Dark Knight? The Black Knight?
attributes.name: A Popcorn-Clutching Knight

attributes.content: It just means someone really strong!
attributes.name: An Audience Knight

attributes.content: Her name—ooh, the red-hot crowd is already beginning to chant her name—welcome, THE CANDLE KNIGHT! VIVIAAANAAAAA DROOOOOOSTE!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Good evening, Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Good evening.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The cacophony of voices seems to gradually abate, and in that moment, the two knights nod at each other.
The Candle Knight slowly lifts her hand.
Light and heat, weaving and twining in response to her title.
Radiant Knight, are you proud of who you are?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: As a knight? Or as an Infected?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: As Margaret Nearl.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hm... a common answer.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Were you aware? Truthfully, I was the bastard daughter of a Leithanian noble.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: There at the top of that spire, I couldn't even hear the human clamor of the city down below.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: I couldn't hear the peddlers market their wares, nor the cars roll across the surface. Every night, the darkness enveloped me, from each and every direction.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: However, my mother... would bring me, in secret, wax candles.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Wax... candles?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Electric lights tend to be easy to spot, don't they? And that noble household always kept so many ornamental candles around, no one would notice if a few went missing.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: By the candlelight, I would read. Poems, novels, prose from all nations. They were full of magic.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: In those days, I read a fair share of books.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Books, depicting... knights.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.text: 'Once the waves washed away, once glory and life together faded.'
'The world and all its beings fallen from zenith to nadir, becoming dust.'
'Once the forge belched its flames, once Catastrophe descended, once families and old friends all let this be forgotten.'
'The last knight upon this great land, all alone, faced the swells as dark as night and began to charge.'

attributes.content: ...A knight novel?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A fabricated romance, only meant to stir people's imaginations, correct?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Radiant Knight, since becoming a knight, what is it you've wanted to do?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: And what should a knight do?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: The two knights seem to be conversing in their pre-match moments! The atmosphere's so friendly, anyone would hate to shatter it!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: But in the end, a match is a match! Knights, to your positions please!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: That was the identity I came to Kazimierz with, practically 'banished' to this nation. Simply so I could live on, I chose to become a knight.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: To be frank, when I realized that winning matches, earning popularity, was all it took to become 'a knight,' I was disappointed.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: And in these years, I've never felt much of anything genuine. As if my days making a living in Kazimierz—aren't even as rich as my time hidden in the spire.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: But you're different.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: When I came to Kazimierz, the Radiant Knight had already been banished. But as a knight, I'd always hear all kinds of anecdotes about you.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: You do invite curiosity. If you disdain the knight competitions of now, what goal do you pursue by participating? Is it simply to take this championship, prove something?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Back then, at the time, that was indeed my belief.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: If everyone's gazes had diverted from glory, I would go to where they focused most, and tell them all, the knights still remain.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: At the time?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: After I left Kazimierz, I traveled to many places. By no means was I always free from bewilderment—but by the end, I'd chosen my own justice, my own faith.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: To rescue the Infected?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Yes, but not that alone.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: So this is your definition of a knight?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: If you demand an answer... I once told my sister as much, and to this day, I've still never amended this notion.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: 'To be a knight is to be the noble light that illuminates the land.'
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Candle Knight and the Radiant Knight, then.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Now there's a match that'll light up every corner. Don't you think, V?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Hey, old bones. Why've you been so out of sorts lately? What's wrong? Did that Nightzmora end up being your long-lost lovechild or what have you?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Spadaj, what the hell nonsense are you talking?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hold on, Maria's not here?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: She wouldn't miss her sister's match for the world. Should be right on her way.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I'll go and look for her.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Illuminate... the land.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Not all people can illuminate the land, Radiant Knight. Most are but tiny candle-flames, barely enough to light the way on their own lives.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: The storm rocks us. In this age, a candle-flame is indistinct, the people have lost their selves, and what frightens me, is they aren't even conscious of it.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Knowing this full well, why must you still—
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Are you doubting yourself? Viviana?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You call me by my name.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: That may be who you really are, the Candle Knight is no more than a title upon you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: People's fates are not decided by their births, Viviana. In my view, you are an outstanding knight.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...Heheh.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: (Leithanian) If your faith truly is as unshakeable as the sun, allow such a meager candle-flame as myself...
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: (Leithanian) To try and wrest a moment of your rays.
attributes.name: Candle Knight
